subject: Plus X Racing Simulator pedals
description_text: Hello! My Plus X Racing Simulator pedals have broken. The plastic plates in the gas pedal that the spring rests on have broken. This happened when I tried to move the blue rubber stopper as far away from the pedal as possible. Отправлено из мобильной Яндекс.Почты: http://m.ya.ru/ymail
